hibernate-mapping.sql-query: INSERT INTO tvisit(ip,`date`) VALUES (IFNULL(INET_ATON(?),0),NOW());
INSERT IGNORE INTO tvisituser(idVisit,idUser) VALUES (?,?);
INSERT IGNORE INTO tvisitlesson(idVisit,idLesson) VALUES (?,?);

SELECT COALESCE( COUNT(DISTINCT tvs.idVisit)/7,COUNT(DISTINCT tvm.idVisit)/30,COUNT(DISTINCT tvt.idVisit)/datediff(now(),min(tvt.date))) as lessonViews FROM tvisitlesson tvl LEFT JOIN tvisit tvt USING(idvisit) LEFT JOIN tvisit tvm ON tvm.idvisit = tvl.idvisit and tvm.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) LEFT JOIN tvisit tvs ON tvs.idvisit = tvl.idvisit and tvs.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 1 WEEK) WHERE idLesson = ? GROUP BY idLesson;
SELECT COUNT(idVisitTest) as attempts FROM tvisittest JOIN tvisituser USING (idVisit) WHERE idLessonTest = ? AND idUser = ? GROUP BY idLessonTest, idUser;
INSERT INTO tvisittest(idVisit, idLessonTest, points, `date`) VALUES (?,?,?,NOW());
INSERT IGNORE INTO tvisittestkos(idVisitTest, idQuestion) VALUES (?,?);
SELECT idLessonTest, idUser, idVisitTest, attempts, points, `date` FROM tvisittestrank JOIN tvisittest USING (idvisittest, idLessonTest) WHERE idLessonTest = ? AND idUser = ?;
SELECT idUser FROM tvisittestrank JOIN tvisittest USING (idvisittest, idLessonTest) WHERE idLessonTest = ? ORDER BY points DESC,attempts ASC,`date` DESC LIMIT ?;
INSERT IGNORE INTO tvisittag(idVisit,idTag) VALUES (?,?);

SELECT COALESCE( COUNT(DISTINCT tvs.idVisit)/7,COUNT(DISTINCT tvm.idVisit)/30,COUNT(DISTINCT tvy.idVisit)/datediff(now(),min(tvy.date))) as tagViews FROM tvisittag tvt LEFT JOIN tvisit tvy USING(idvisit) LEFT JOIN tvisit tvm ON tvm.idvisit = tvt.idvisit and tvm.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) LEFT JOIN tvisit tvs ON tvs.idvisit = tvt.idvisit and tvs.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 1 WEEK) WHERE idTag = ? GROUP BY idTag;
SELECT COUNT(idVisitTest) as numTests FROM teachonsnap.tvisittest WHERE idlessontest = ? GROUP BY idLessonTest

SELECT idQuestion, COUNT(DISTINCT tko.idQuestion) as KOs FROM teachonsnap.tvisittest JOIN teachonsnap.tquestion USING(idLessonTest) LEFT JOIN teachonsnap.tvisittestkos tko USING(idvisittest,idQuestion) WHERE idlessontest = ? GROUP BY idQuestion

SELECT date(fillDateTrick.key) as 'key', COUNT(tv.idVisit) as 'value', -1 as id FROM (SELECT adddate(date(date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 29 DAY)), @num\:=@num+1) as 'key' FROM tlesson, (select @num\:=-1) num LIMIT 30 ) as fillDateTrick LEFT JOIN ( tvisit tv JOIN tvisitlesson tvl ON tv.idvisit=tvl.idvisit AND idLesson = ? ) ON date(fillDateTrick.key)=date(tv.date) AND tv.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 30 DAY)
GROUP BY DATE(fillDateTrick.key);

SELECT concat(year(fillDateTrick.key),'/',month(fillDateTrick.key)) as 'key', COUNT(tv.idVisit) as 'value', -1 as id FROM (SELECT adddate(date(date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 11 MONTH)), INTERVAL @num\:=@num+1 MONTH) as 'key' FROM tlesson, (select @num\:=-1) num LIMIT 12 ) as fillDateTrick LEFT JOIN ( tvisit tv JOIN tvisitlesson tvl ON tv.idvisit=tvl.idvisit AND idLesson = ? ) ON MONTH(fillDateTrick.key)=MONTH(tv.date) AND tv.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 12 MONTH)
GROUP BY year(fillDateTrick.key),MONTH(fillDateTrick.key);

SELECT date(fillDateTrick.key) as 'key', COUNT(tv.idVisit) as 'value', -1 as id FROM (SELECT adddate(date(date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 29 DAY)), @num\:=@num+1) as 'key' FROM tlesson, (select @num\:=-1) num LIMIT 30 ) as fillDateTrick LEFT JOIN ( tvisit tv JOIN tvisitlesson tvl ON tv.idvisit=tvl.idvisit JOIN tlesson tl ON tl.idLesson = tvl.idLesson AND idUser = ? ) ON date(fillDateTrick.key)=date(tv.date) AND tv.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 30 DAY)
GROUP BY DATE(fillDateTrick.key);

SELECT concat(year(fillDateTrick.key),'/',month(fillDateTrick.key)) as 'key', COUNT(tv.idVisit) as 'value', -1 as id FROM (SELECT adddate(date(date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 11 MONTH)), INTERVAL @num\:=@num+1 MONTH) as 'key' FROM tlesson, (select @num\:=-1) num LIMIT 12 ) as fillDateTrick LEFT JOIN ( tvisit tv JOIN tvisitlesson tvl ON tv.idvisit=tvl.idvisit JOIN tlesson tl ON tl.idLesson = tvl.idLesson AND idUser = ? ) ON MONTH(fillDateTrick.key)=MONTH(tv.date) AND tv.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 12 MONTH)
GROUP BY year(fillDateTrick.key),MONTH(fillDateTrick.key);

SELECT title as 'key', COUNT(tv.idVisit) as 'value', tvl.idLesson as id FROM tvisit tv JOIN tvisitlesson tvl USING(idvisit) JOIN tlesson tl USING(idLesson) WHERE idUser = ? AND tv.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY tvl.idlesson ORDER BY COUNT(tv.idVisit) DESC LIMIT ?;

SELECT title as 'key', COUNT(tv.idVisit) as 'value', tvl.idLesson as id FROM tvisit tv JOIN tvisitlesson tvl USING(idvisit) JOIN tlesson tl USING(idLesson) WHERE idUser = ? AND tv.date > date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY tvl.idlesson ORDER BY COUNT(tv.idVisit) DESC LIMIT ?;
